#include<stdio.h>
//#include<conio.h>
int main()
{
    long int n1,n2,i,j,diff,min=10000000;
    scanf("%ld",&n1);
    long int a[n1];
    for(i=0;i<n1;i++)
    scanf("%ld",&a[i]);
    scanf("%ld",&n2);
    long int b[n2];
    for(i=0;i<n2;i++)
    scanf("%ld",&b[i]);
    for(i=0;i<n1;i++)
    for(j=0;j<n2;j++)
    {
                     diff=a[i]-b[j];
                     if((a[i]-b[j])<0)
                     diff=-diff;
                     if(diff<min)
                     min=diff;
    }
    printf("%ld\n",min);
    //getch();
    return 0;
}
